content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to create Payment Request in SimplePay for Subcontractors\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All subcontractor invoices must be submitted using a special platform for Subcontractors SimplePay - \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://simplepay.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https:// simplepay.epam.com/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".  This allows the invoice to go through the verification (by Finance team) and approval (by project Management) processes. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please review below guidance in case you provide services as a direct contractor or work under your own company. If you are engaged through an agency or third-party entity, then it can be skipped as your invoice will be processed by assigned delegates.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case you are contracted with EPAM entity other than the one mentioned in this guide – please contact \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFASubcontractorsFinanceAsia@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Subcontractors Finance Asia\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" via email for sharing necessary information regarding invoicing process. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The access to SimplePay platform will be provided at the beginning of month next to the month of your engagement. No additional requests are needed from your side.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The system automatically generates a line item once a month for services you record in TIME under your project activity. Auto line items move to manager review on the first workday of each month following the reporting month. The main requirement to the correct line generation is a correctly filled time sheet in the TIME application. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If your regular activity is not project related, you need to create Manual line item choosing Report work option. Please attach a screenshot from TIME or a time sheet in a free form in PDF format to it.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some tips for manual line creation you can find on this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=967469957\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please make sure that the rate is applied correctly. If not, please Request Adjustments on the Platform or contact Subcontractors ops team directly (WFA Subcontractors Finance Asia –  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFASubcontractorsFinanceAsia@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFASubcontractorsFinanceAsia@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Before service line can be added in the invoice, all hours worked must be accepted by the EPAM responsible manager. It means, that line will be able to be added to invoice only in the status “Accepted”. Any other statuses do not give opportunity to add line to invoice. Once accepted, the line can be included in the invoice item along with your PDF invoice. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Invoice can contain one or few lines depending on the number of projects you have worked under. So that, if you have been involved in few projects in reporting period, the lines will be generated separately for each of them.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Invoice number, invoice date of issue (the invoice date should not be earlier than the last date of providing services in reporting period) and due date (due date should correspond to the Agreement payment terms)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Amount(s) owed\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The invoice must be attached on the Platform in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"non-editable format\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (NOT in Word or Excel, BUT as a PDF file).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the invoice is created on the platform, please make sure, that you have submitted the invoice. That mean, that the invoice needs to have the status “Finance review”. Till the invoice has the status “Draft”, finance team is not able to review and send it for future verification. Before submitting the invoice, please pay your attention, that the information filled on the SimplePay is the same as in attached document to invoice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the invoice needs to be corrected after it is submitting, please use this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSBCMPUB/Recalling+invoices \"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any travel expenses,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" you can include them in the same PDF invoice or in a separate one (in this case please add another line labeled as “travel expenses”).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To process business trip expenses, there should be \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"copies of all associated receipts\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (total amount of the receipts must be equal to the total amount of expenses specified in the invoice). If travel expenses incurred are billed in the currency that is differ from the billing one (e.g. receipts are in EUR, invoice is billed in CNY), you have got two options:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"card statement or exchange receipts are required,\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OR\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"exchange rate for travel expenses can be taken from https://www.oanda.com (FX XR) on the date of the expense incurred.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order for you to submit travel or any other expenses incurred (services that are not based on hours) on the Platform, please create a Manual line item on the SimplePay platform, choose Report expense option and “Travel and other reimbursable expenses” category, attach all associated receipts and submit the line.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"any other expenses incurred and services that are not based on line\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" as well.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once this line is verified by the Finance team (Subcontractors operations), you can create an
